website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Strix Hero Edition is an all-around capable midrange laptop made for MOBA gamers, delivering 60fps HD gaming at 120Hz without busting your budget.

customer_reviews.title: Overall the laptop is great
customer_reviews.text: The laptop arrived pretty fast with amazon prime. Overall the laptop is great, it can handle any game on ultra with great frame rates. The only issue i have with it is that the fans aren't great as they get pretty loud when gaming, it's fine if you wear headphones but i still wish the cooling was better. Seller - 10/10 Laptop Design - 10/10 Laptop Performance - 10/10 Laptop Cooling/fans - 6/10 Overall - 8.5/10 I recommend this laptop because I bought it for £880 which is pretty good for a laptop with a GTX 1060
customer_reviews.author: Amal Kolanganni

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Fans are a little loud, literally the only possible complaint I have, and even then complaint isn't the word. Its understandable with the hardware that the fans kick in pretty loud when gaming, but most gamers have headsets, so this issue is definitely not a deal breaker Laptop has great specs for the price, especially with that 120hz screen, game slook great, hit 100+ GPS on most games at high settings, cpu can occasionally be a bottleneck on some new aaa and early access titles, but that a steal for shy of 900 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: TheTrueClayton

customer_reviews.title: very nice laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: very nice laptop for the price, slim and nice keys, a small negative is the heat disipation is not very good, however I had a problem (with windows?) over some drivers not detected and plenty of blue screens, so I returned it, anyway, seems to be an isolated incident I suppose
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: One hell of a laptop
customer_reviews.text: After several months of use i have to say this is a well built and powerful laptop. I actually use it a lot and really put this thing through its paces. And I've had zero problems. The keyboard is the best I've ever used. The buttons have that perfect clickyness.
customer_reviews.author: Jimrex

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Decent laptop for 1080 gaming @ normal to high settings, on triple AAA games......highest the CPU temps reached was 84c.......thermal-volted with software and temps now around 74c max , overall my 1st gaming laptop &couldnt be happier..
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Portable gaming dream
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop runs everything I can on my desktop on high/max settings. Never thought I'd see laptops stand up to their desktop equivalents. Looks great and the display is one of the best I've seen. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop so far, very powerful and of relatively good quality. The battery life isn't very good, but that is to be expected for a gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJake

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer that the laptop came with either the 8th gen i5. or 7th gen i7
customer_reviews.author: Ibrar93

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop. Looks and feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Looks and feels amazing. Runs all modern games on full at Q2 18. Screen is great. I do recommend getting a cooling pad to put under the laptop because when gaming it can get hot.
customer_reviews.author: richard smith

customer_reviews.title: Bad cooling sistem and gets too hot
customer_reviews.text: This laptop endured 4 months for me and now it doesnt turn on anymore. I was taking very good care of it and using havit cooling pad but still it crashed. Very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop, but lazy 7 days delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived well, even if was delivered to a store, everything was fine. Didn't got that 149£ games package that was promised when I ordered the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Mamaliga

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great power and display but maybe a tiny bit loud, but great deal for £890
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jodrell

customer_reviews.title: Best £1100 i've spent in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gaming laptop, I mainly use it for playing my lesser demanding titles, although i do love a good game on PUBG while in bed every now and then! Well worth the asking price, and the SSD for the boot drive and SSHD for storage is the best of both worlds! Plays every game i throw at it, the GTX 1060 is really good, it surpassed my expectations to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Just one issue with an otherwise nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: All around brilliant machine, only problem is the trackpad, which often refuses to respond properly, doesn't scroll or move, and clicks when I try to move the cursor. Not too much of an issue since I use a mouse most of the time, but a bit irritating for the times I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Faulty laptop
customer_reviews.text: The power cable burnt and melted after only a couple of weeks of use, disappointed that such an expensive laptop had such a fault.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: GPU usage at 35% This is a waste of money and I will request a refund as ...
customer_reviews.text: GPU is being used at 40% max due to the CPU bottleneck in EVERY CURRENT GAME. - VR ready? NO!, motion sickness in every Oculus Rift title due to under 45 FPS - Far Cry 5 - 20-40 FPS on lowest settings with 0.6 resolution scaling!!! - World of Tanks (7 year old game!) - 30-70 FPS, GPU usage at 35% This is a waste of money and I will request a refund as soon as I get back to UK from delegation. This review is for "Intel i5-7300HQ, 8 GB RAM, 120 Hz 100 Percent sRGB Display, Nvidia GTX 1060 6 GB GPU, 1 TB FireCuda SSHD and 128 GB SSD"
customer_reviews.author: Mariusz Truchlewski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gaming laptop for this price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gaming laptop for this price. U wont get anything better for this price than this laptop. Everything works great
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

product_meta.title: ASUS GL503VM-GZ128T ROG Strix 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop - Black
product_meta.description:
ASUS ROG Strip GL503VM GZ128T - 15.6" - Core i5 7300HQ - 8 GB RAM - 128 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD - ROG Strip GL503 provides all the necessary tools to raise your mastery of the game to another level. Engineered with a fast processor and powerful graphics, Strip GL503 equips you to control the competition. So gear up, stake your ground, and get ready to win.

BOX CONTAINS
Asus GL503VM-GZ128T & Power Adapter
